answerText: Manitoulin Island[10] Manitoulin Island is located in this body of water that is drained by the St. Clair River and that also contains Drummond Island.  The Canadian city of Sarnia is found on its banks.
heading: Missiles of October |2011 | 10 | 19 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: It is located near the furthest extent of the Bruch Peninsula.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this largest freshwater island in the world, the home of Lake Manitou and Lake Mindemoya and the town of Gore Bay.
